author: mrkoberman
content:
We build a k6 extension for load testing Ethereum RPC nodes. Gasper allows you to simulate multiple wallets sending transactions concurrently to measure node performance and reliability. https://github.com/MysteryForge/gasper.

With this extension, you have the full power of k6 at your fingertips, scripting, thresholds, metrics, and integrations, combined with purpose built tools to test Ethereum JSON-RPC APIs at scale.

Metrics are exported to InfluxDB and visualised in Grafana, so you can monitor performance using the tools you already know and trust.

author: barnabasbusa
content: We build a k6 extension for load testing
